amendment.description: To preserve existing rights and responsibilities with respect to waters of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 868, under the order of 5/14/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 44. Record Vote Number: 119.

action.text: Amendment SA 868 proposed by Senator Barrasso.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 868 proposed by Senator Barrasso.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 868, under the order of 5/14/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 44. Record Vote Number: 119.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 868, under the order of 5/14/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 44. Record Vote Number: 119.
